DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Detrol LA On Memory And Cognition In Elderly Population
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 65 75 year Having score great equal 26 MiniMental State Exam ( MMSE ) Current history bladder outlet obstruction . Previous history acute urinary retention require catheterization , severe void difficulty judgment investigator , prior randomization Significant hepatic renal disease , define twice upper limit reference range regard serum concentration AST , ALT , ALP , urea nitrogen , creatinine
